sentences.sContent: I used also to recite to her the scraps of poetry used as illustrations in the chapter on prosody or rhetoric of our Bengali grammar.
sentences.sContent_eng: I used also to recite to her the scraps of poetry used as illustrations in the chapter on prosody or rhetoric of our Bengali grammar.
sentences.sCn: 我也常常把孟加拉语法书上，在讲到作诗法或是修辞学时所用作例子的诗句背给她听。

words.tran: 诗体学的；作诗法的；韵律学的

trans.tranCn: 诗体论, 作诗法, 韵律学
trans.tranOther: the patterns of sound and  rhythm  in poetry and spoken language, or the rules for arranging these patterns
